mapper.select: select * from tb_msg_regex where form_id=#{formId} and regex_id=#{regexId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_msg_regex (form_id, regex_id, shop_cd, key_1, value_1, key_2, value_2, key_3, value_3, key_4, value_4, key_5, value_5, key_6, value_6, key_7, value_7, key_8, value_8, key_9, value_9, key_10, value_10, key_11, value_11, key_12, value_12, key_13, value_13, key_14, value_14, key_15, value_15) values (form_id=#{formId},regex_id=#{regexId}, shop_cd=#{shopCd},#{insertString})
